info.title: FitPass HOPn API Documentation
info.description: API Documentation for the FitPass HOPn Platform

get.summary: Get a high-level overview of the entire platform
Get a summary of activity for each company
Get performance stats for all partners

post.summary: Authenticate user and return API token

get.summary: Get a list of the authenticated user's bookings

200.description: A list of the user's bookings.

post.summary: Book the authenticated user into a specific class

parameters.name: classId
parameters.description: The ID of the class to book

409.description: Class is full or already booked

post.summary: Record a check-in for the authenticated user at a partner location

requestBody.description: The ID of the partner to check into.

422.description: Validation error (e.g., partner_id is missing or invalid)

get.summary: Get usage summary for the admin's company
Get check-in counts per partner for the admin's company
Get a list of employees for the admin's company

post.summary: Create a new employee within the admin's company

role.description: Role within the company. Defaults to 'employee'.

get.summary: Get details of a single employee within the admin's company

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to retrieve

404.description: Employee not found or not in company

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to update

delete.summary: Delete an employee from the company

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to delete

get.summary: [Company Admin] Download a PDF invoice for the admin's company

403.description: Forbidden (User is not a company admin or has no company)

get.summary: Get a public list of all active membership plans

features.example: All gyms, All spas, Personal trainer

get.summary: Get details of a single plan (admin only)
Get a public list of approved partners
Get details for a single partner
Get a list of all classes offered by a single partner

BookingResource.title: Booking Resource
BookingResource.description: Represents a user's booking for a class.

CheckinResource.title: Check-in Resource
CheckinResource.description: Represents a single user check-in event.

ClassModelResource.title: Class Model Resource
ClassModelResource.description: Represents a single class or session.

description.example: A refreshing yoga session to start your day.

MembershipPlanResource.title: Membership Plan Resource
MembershipPlanResource.description: Represents a single membership plan available for users.

price.description: The price formatted to two decimal places.

features.example: Access to all gyms, spa included, 1 personal trainer session per month.

PartnerResource.title: Partner Resource
PartnerResource.description: Represents a partner gym, spa, or club.

tags.name: Check-in
tags.description: Endpoints for user check-ins at partner locations

tags.name: Company Admin - Employees
tags.description: Endpoints for HR Admins to manage employees within their company

tags.name: Membership Plans
tags.description: Endpoints for viewing and managing membership plans

tags.name: Partners
tags.description: Endpoints for viewing and managing partners (gyms, spas, etc.)
